record.description: At the control board used to operate McDonald Observatory's dome and 82-inch reflecting telescope. Both observatory, in the Davis Mountains of Western Texas, and telescope, the second largest in the world, were designed and built by the Warner and Swasey Company of Cleveland, Ohio for the University of Texas which will operate the facility with the University of Chicago. The observatory will be dedicated May 5, 1939.
